name: Kachchi Biryani
info: Kachchi Biryani is a popular traditional Bangladeshi dish made with layers of marinated raw meat and aromatic rice, cooked together in a sealed pot, resulting in a flavorful and fragrant one-pot meal.

name: Ilish Vaja
info: Ilish Vaja is a popular Bangladeshi dish made with fried Hilsa fish, marinated in a blend of spices and served with steaming hot rice and lentil soup, often enjoyed as a traditional and delicious meal.

name: Kala Bhuna
info: Kala Bhuna is a Bangladeshi dish made with black chicken cooked in a blend of spices, onions, and tomatoes, which results in a rich and flavorful sauce.
